about_the_game:
Wallpaper pack hand picked by the developer.

***June 2020, added two more wallpapers, Fantasy Alchemy Ver.A and Ver.B, comes in animated 4K, still 4K for PC, 4K and 2K for phones.
***June 2020, added two more wallpapers, Distant Miracle Ver.A and Ver.B, comes in animated 4K, still 4K for PC, 4K and 2K for phones.
***June 2020, added two more wallpapers, Outerworld Fantasy Ver.A and Ver.B, comes in 4K for PC, 4K and 2K for phones.
***May 2020, added "Crystals and Mirage" animated wallpaper, comes in 4K for PC, 4K and 2K still image for phones.
***March 2020, added one more wallpaper, Neko-Gods in Pajamas, comes in 4K for PC, 4K and 2K for phones.
Contains wallpaper for you PC, phone and animated wallpaper for Wallpaper Engine.
You can check the pictures in the DLC under the folder DLC_Wallpaper in the root folder of Mysteria after downloading it.
For instruction for how to apply the wallpaper please check the READ_ME file under DLC folder.
